creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: 3/4 portrait of woman facing PL; coyly cradling partially folded white fan under chin; bright red detailing in kimono collar; large headdress; blue and white hair ornament at back; two hair sticks at front with red beads; pink upper lip, green lower lip
medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk
title: Three Beauties, one of three
